page_description: Please provide the country where your institution pays taxes. <0>Why do we collect this information?</0>

label.tax_country_label: Country you are liable to pay tax in
label.company_tax_country: What country does your company pay tax in?
label.company_tax_other_countries: In what other country does your company pay taxes?

validation_error_messages.same_tax_country: {{country}} has already been selected {{count}} times. Please select a different country.
validation_error_messages.national_insurance_number: Please enter a valid National Insurance number
validation_error_messages.uk_company_tax_number_invalid: Please enter a valid Tax Identification number. UTR is a 10 digit number (e.g. 9999999999).
validation_error_messages.us_company_tax_number_invalid: Please enter a valid Tax Identification number. TIN is a 9 digit number (e.g 999-99-9999 or 99-9999999).
validation_error_messages.tax_identification_number: Please enter a valid Tax Identification number

comply_message: Seedrs needs to comply with your resident states tax authority requirements regarding the exchange of information under the Common Reporting Standards (CRS). For more information <0>see here</0>.

no_tax_residency_view.heading: Sorry, only registered tax payers can invest.

no_tax_residency_view.description_2: Please go back a step to provide your tax number to continue.
